programme.title: Bad Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: A man brings his best friend along when he has to be introduced to his girlfriend's terrifying family, a family that turns out to be even more terrifying than expected.

programme.title: Appassionata
programme.desc: A passionate and forbidden love story that unfolds between two characters from different walks of life.

programme.title: It isn't is true... but I believe it
programme.desc: A superstitious entrepreneur hires a "lucky" man, only to face an unexpected turn of fate.

programme.title: Provocation
programme.desc: Vanessa, widowed at a young age, lives with her step-daughters Kikki and Vivi in a luxurious villa on the island of San Pietro. They have recently moved in with Roberto, a professor and former lover of Vanessa's, who is in charge of giving private lessons to the two girls in preparation for their high school exams. Inside the mansion there is constant tension, a climate of hatred in which the man will become involved despite himself with increasingly tragic consequences.

programme.title: Bed of a thousand pleasure
programme.desc: A whimsical reimagining of the famous 1001 Nights, filled with intrigue, romance, and fantasy.

programme.title: Quinto: non ammazzare
programme.desc: In Quinto: Non ammazzare, revenge and moral challenges intertwine in a gripping tale of justice.

programme.title: Daitona
programme.desc: Daitona follows a thrilling journey of survival as its characters face high-speed danger and treachery.

programme.title: The Clan
programme.desc: Franco and Dino, two mechanics from Rome, leave for Las Vegas to participate in the Harley-Davidson world meeting. They count on winning the reward provided for participants. But their real big dream is different. It is music. The two of them sing and dance to pieces by Frank Sinatra and Dean Martin without thinking that this could become a profession.

programme.title: Love hurts
programme.desc: Germana is an untalented and unlucky aspiring actress, a somewhat inconsiderate mother and the mistress of a rich lawyer who supports her financially. Elisabetta, her neighbour, on the other hand, is a successful doctor, too closed in her schemes to realise her husband is homosexual until she is left alone with many questions. When Gianmarco, a family man in a work crisis, saves Germana's daughter from an accident, sparks fly between them. Too bad she does not know that he is married and is Elisabetta's friend. Fate brings them face to face with reality when, during a holiday in Sicily, they all meet again, forcing them to confront each other.

programme.title: A Sky Full of Stars for a Roof
programme.desc: Two drifters meet and soon become travelling companions. But one of them, Tim (Gemma), is being chased by a crazed killer and his band of gunmen to settle an old score. The two (Adore being the other) are chased through the west, encountering scrape after scrape until the killers catch up and the score is settled for good.

programme.title: Bed of a thousand pleasure
programme.desc: A whimsical reimagining of the famous 1001 Nights, filled with intrigue, romance, and fantasy.

programme.title: Quinto: non ammazzare
programme.desc: In Quinto: Non ammazzare, revenge and moral challenges intertwine in a gripping tale of justice.
